mapper.select: select seq, id, title, content, rdate, wdate from(select row_number()over(partition by substr(rdate, 1, 8) order by rdate asc) as rnum, seq, id, title, content, rdate, wdate from calendar where id=#{id} and substr(rdate, 1, 6)=${yyyyMM}) a where rnum between 1 and 5
mapper.insert: insert into blacklist(id, blockid, reason, adddate) values (#{id}, #{blockid}, #{reason}, now());
insert into blacklist(id, word, reason, adddate) values (#{id}, #{word}, #{reason}, now());
